thread.title: Daszkal Bolton names three partners in charge
thread.title_full: Daszkal Bolton names three partners in charge

author: Nina Lincoff
title: Daszkal Bolton names three partners in charge
text: Michael Daszkal, managing partner and co-founder of Daszkal Bolton. Jock Fistick Boca Raton-based Daszkal Bolton has reorganized its management structure in response to the accounting firm’s growing footprint. The firm has appointed Timothy R. Devlin , Colleen DeWoody Bracci , and Teri M. Kaye as partners in charge of Daszkal Bolton’s Boca Raton, Jupiter and Fort Lauderdale offices, respectively. “Due to the continuous growth of the firm, the executive committee deemed it appropriate to name a PIC for each office to not only lead the firm’s professionals on a local basis, but also together as one cohesive, regional practice,'' said Michael Daszkal , managing partner and co-founder of the firm. "It establishes a lead in each community as well,” he added. Michael Daszkal, managing partner and co-founder of Daszkal Bolton. Jock Fistick Devlin, partner in charge of the Boca Raton office and tax services practice leader, has been a partner at the firm for 19 years. DeWoody Bracci, partner in charge of the Jupiter office, has been with the firm for 12 years. Kaye, partner in charge of the Fort Lauderdale office, has been with the firm for six years. Daszkal Bolton is an accounting and consulting firm to small and middle market companies. The firm has more than 130 employees in across the South Florida market. Nina Lincoff covers banking, finance, insurance and investments. Get the latest banking news with our free daily newsletter. Click here to subscribe. Related Content
